trans-unit.source: Provides a read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una raccolta di sola lettura di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The TransformerTypeCollection class represents a read-only collection of objects, typically used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> objects to manage sets of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe TransformerTypeCollection rappresenta una raccolta di sola lettura di oggetti, in genere utilizzati dagli <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>gli oggetti da gestire insiemi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses a TransformerTypeCollection collection to keep a list of available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects on a page, whereas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> object uses a TransformerTypeCollection collection to track the available <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects that it contains.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza una raccolta di TransformerTypeCollection per mantenere un elenco di disponibili <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>oggetti in una pagina, mentre un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>oggetto utilizza una raccolta di TransformerTypeCollection per tenere traccia disponibili <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>oggetti in esso contenuti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Although the TransformerTypeCollection collection is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Anche se la raccolta di TransformerTypeCollection è di sola lettura, è possibile apportare modifiche a livello di codice alle proprietà dei controlli sottostanti a cui viene fatto riferimento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"></xref> class with no members in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"> </xref> classe senza membri nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"></xref> class containing the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"> </xref> classe che contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: transformerTypes contains objects that are not transformers.
trans-unit.target: transformerTypescontiene gli oggetti che non sono convertitori.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"></xref> class by combining an existing <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"></xref> collection with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"> </xref> classe combinando esistente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"> </xref> insieme con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects already contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti già presenti un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects to combine with the collection in the `existingTransformerTypes` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti da combinare con l'insieme di `existingTransformerTypes` parametro.

trans-unit.source: transformerTypes contains objects that are not transformers.
trans-unit.target: transformerTypescontiene gli oggetti che non sono convertitori.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular transformer exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un trasformatore specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains consente di verificare un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> che viene controllato per determinare se è nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular transformer is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se è presente un trasformatore specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia la raccolta in una matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> collection, a subset of those objects, or a superset of those objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice personalizzata che può contenere tutti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>gli oggetti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection>insieme, un subset di tali oggetti o un superset di tali oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetti in cui viene copiata insieme.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Il punto iniziale nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection for storing transformers.
trans-unit.target: Crea una raccolta per l'archiviazione dei convertitori.

trans-unit.source: The Empty field creates and returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il campo vuoto crea e restituisce una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The instance is created through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor and does not contain any existing members in the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'istanza viene creata tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.%23ctor%2A>costruttore e non contiene tutti i membri esistenti nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TransformerTypeCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> che fa parte della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro della raccolta in base alla posizione nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di un determinato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> in una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The located at index.
trans-unit.target: The located at index.
